p: In the analysis based on age groups, the infant, early childhood, and middle childhood groups had the most patients in March (Spring) and least in August (summer) (Table 2). Among the adolescents, most cases of HSP were reported in April (479 patient, 12.0%) and spring (1302 patients, 32.7%). However, unlike in the other age groups, among adolescents, 290 (7.3%), 237 (6.0%), 254 (6.4%), and 269 (6.8%) patients were diagnosed in August through November, respectively. More patients were diagnosed in the summer (985 patients, 24.8%) than in the fall (760 patients, 19.1%).
